messages.content: I have lived in the Stroud constituency for the past twenty years. I've raised an extended family of four daughters, trained and worked locally as an electrician. I have a varied employment background in engineering consultancy and business. I was constituency coordinator for the Brexit campaign and am dedicated to achieving the clean Brexit exit you all voted for. I support many popular UKIP policies including a look at foreign aid, controlled borders, and direct democracy.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in the Stroud constituency for the past twenty years. I've raised an extended family of four daughters, trained and worked locally as an electrician. I have a varied employment background in engineering consultancy and business. I was constituency coordinator for the Brexit campaign and am dedicated to achieving the clean Brexit exit you all voted for. I support many popular UKIP policies including a look at foreign aid, controlled borders, and direct democracy. Yours sincerely, Glenville Gogerly
